props.title: Node connections
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.node.connections`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Node requests
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.node.requestsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Node packets out
props.query: SELECT average(`f5.node.sessions`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Node packets in
props.query: SELECT average(`node.packetsReceived`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
